Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Stinkbomb/Ramhorn/The Rock/Usurp:

Nemesis slowly got up, cursing, firing off a few pot shots form his laser 
rifle at random warrior's of the People's group, looking to Bloodstryke.  
"Stay here, finish everyone off.  If it gets to hot, pull out."

Nemesis and Scattershot both got up, heading off towards the Alliance base.
===============
Ramhorn sighs, activating his com.  <Iris...I think it 
is...hello...could...hmmm...this is so silly!  Tell Iron Raptor that Suukie 
murdered Stinkbomb, and to have you set to open fire on Suukie if he 
approaches...errr...thanks> Ramhorn grabbed Stinkbomb's body the Maximal 
DEAD, dragging him into the engine room, he put the 'corpse' into an 
incinerator, shutting the door and heading for a CR chamber, slamming his 
fist against the wall.
===============
The Rock went over to his stasis pod, getting in.  -Well, there's only one 
way to go, and that's down!- he thought to himself, pushing downward on the 
stasis pod, the pod going sliding down the Himalayas, at 8,500 FT high.  
After several minutes, an avalanche was following Rock, the sea of white 
getting closer and closer, Rock yelling out as what looked like a shooting 
star came at him.  Hitting right in front of him, his own stasis pod went 
flying through the air 20 ft, slamming into the cold, wet snow, the avalanche 
burying him 10 ft deep.
------------------
The figure, known as Usurper (a code name), activated the outer thermal 
readings.  Below 0 degrees out farenheit.  Pressing a few buttons, the hatch 
of the stasis pod strained to open, snow beginning to fill the pod, though 
steam was rising around it from the heat of hitting the Earth's surface.  
Finally pushing it open, Usurper, 8 ft high, stepped out of the pod, shaking. 
 Spotting a leg sticking out of the snow a few feet away, he walked over to 
investigate. 
---------------
The Rock could only see white, his optics moving side to side, widening as 
something grabbed him by the right leg, an unknown force with immense 
strength ripping him out of the snow's grip.  Looking up, he recognized a red 
Maximal insignia.  Getting up, he spoke. "Slag, am I glad to se-ugh!" he 
yelled, a punch to the gut sending him keeling over, a kick sending him to 
his back.

"At first, I thought this was a worthless ice planet after I came out of 
stasis lock and my internal repairs were done.  But now, I see, it is Earth 
in the past," reaching into subspace, the figure took out a laser pistol, 
slowly raising it as he spoke, "the Maximal Elders tried to exterminate me 
for what I did at Nebulos, but they failed.  You, one of their cronies, 
must've found me out.  I don't know how, but it-URGH!" The Rock leapt up, 
tackling Usurper into the snow, a few swift punches causing the enemy to drop 
his pistol, the rock getting up and kicking him in the stomach a few times.  
Grabbing the laser pistol, the Rock began to run down the mountain, hoping 
not to run into a patch of land with no snow on it.
-------------------
Usurper stood quickly, after Rock had gotten a hundred feet away.  Taking out 
a sniper rifle, he smiles, activating the electric scope, zooming in closely, 
the crosshairs closing in on the back of Rock's left shin, pulling the 
trigger back a single time, a blue bolt shot out, tearing through the 
unsuspecting Rock's shin, tumbling to the ground yelling pain.  Putting the 
rifle away, taking otu another pistol, Usurper headed for the Rock, going at 
a slight jog.
